context.p: An SMTP server account is required for sending notifications to RemoteTM users. Follow these steps to configure the email server to use.

step.cmd: Login as a user with "System Administrator" privileges.
Click Settings Email Server in main toolbar.
In the SMTP Server text box enter the name or IP of the SMTP server.
In the Port text box enter the port number in which the SMTP server accepts requests.
In the SMTP User text box enter the user name for the SMTP server.
In the SMTP Password text box enter the password for the user selected in previous step.
In the Send From text box enter the email address used for sending notifications.
In the RemoteTM Server text box enter the URL of the RemoteTM server.
Check the Authentication Required check box if your SMTP server requires authentication.
Check the Use TLS check box if your SMTP server requires TLS/SSL protocols.

taskbody.result: The updated email server configuration is stored in RemoteTM server.
